text.tspan: Number of deaths from indoor air pollution, 1990 vs. 2021
Annual number of deaths attributed to indoor air pollution in the year 1990 versus the number in 2021.
Deaths from indoor air pollution in 2021 (deaths)
Deaths from indoor air pollution in 1990 (deaths)
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
